title: Bug 18915[Preferences] switching between erroneous preferences pages should generate error, not warning.
OB: When entering invalid data on any preferences page and trying to select another page without fixing the problem, a warning dialog is displayed with the message: 'The currently displayed page contains invalid values.'
EB: The warning dialog should be changed to an error dialog, considering that users should not be allowed to leave the page without fixing the mistake.
SR: The error dialog should clearly indicate that the user needs to fix the mistake before leaving the page, preventing them from switching to another preferences page.
